Projects

Yelp-like Web Application

JavaScript, Node.js, Express, AngularJS, MongoDB
  • Initialized a web application where allows users to register and login personal profile, add, delete or edit images and comments with Node.JS, Express and MongoDB; refactored to a RESTful route.
  • Implemented modular, maintainable Single Page Applications and apply AJAX with AngularJS.
  • Designed and developed fronted with HTML, Bootstrap, and JS; made UI improvement and notification with npm Connect-flash and Angular animation events.
  • Authenticated users with Passport.JS and Passport-local; Implemented HTML5 Local Storage for users’ favorite items.
  • Tested the web app with unit tests (Postman), and deployed the web app to Heroku.
April 2020 – June 2020

Instagram App Clone

JavaScript, Node.js, Express, React, MySQL
  • Built an Instagram clone allows users to register, post, comment, like, tag and follow, with Node.js, Express backend, React frontend and MySQL for the database; refactored to RESTful route.
  • Designed fronted UI with React, Redux, React-Router and Bootstrap for app pages.
  • Created a database using MySQL with designed many-to-many data schema to store data for user activities.
  • Tested the app and database with unit test using over 8000 mock Instagram user data, and deployed the app to Heroku.
February 2020 – May 2020

Login System App

Python, MySQL, kivy, pygame
  • Created a mobile compatible app of Login system for users to register, login and logout with Python, pygame and kivy.
  • Developed a GUI to switch between 3 windows: login, register and account information.
  • Established a connection to MySQL with the Python SQL module to save, load and validate account information.
  • Deployed the FloatLayout in kivy for the dynamic placement of the objects for mobile compatible GUI.
September 2019 – October 2019

DevOps Server Monitoring Project

AWS EC2, Prometheus, Grafana, Docker
  • Built a server to monitor and diagnose problems for CPU, memory, disk usage, and network traffic of other 2 instances with Prometheus, node-exporter, Grafana, pushgateway and alerting with AlertManager.
  • Launched 3 AWS EC2 Linux2 instances where 1 acted as monitor server and the other 2 as monitored instances.
  • Utilized Docker and Docker Compose to implement 6 monitoring tools in containers and connect all with bridge network.
  • Designed and configured 3 Grafana dashboards to collect and display metrics from monitored instances.
  • Simulated high CPU, memory, disk usage and network traffics to stress test the systems with stress-ng.
July 2020 – September 2020
